name: The Dungeon of Dungeons That You Have to Escape From
name_original: The Dungeon of Dungeons That You Have to Escape From
description:
The Dungeon of Dungeons That You Have To Escape From! is a visual adventure game that drives the player into making the right decisions in maintaining a friendship with a close friend.

This is a game made in a studio simulation class in college.

It is also a demo.

Credits

Me (Zachary Claudio) - Project Manager

Spencer Stowell - Artist

Brandon Kay - Programmer
